crypto.name: Hills
crypto.desc: This cipher is not widely used in cryptography due to its lack of resistance to cracking. Can you break it?

crypto.name: Watchmaker
crypto.desc: What time is it, can you tell me?

forensic.name: Careful with trust
forensic.desc: Relatively recently, an employee in charge of deliveries had to transfer a large sum of money to complete a transaction. His superiors had allocated him his own card for this purpose. Before the transaction was completed, at some point his internet connection went down. He contacted the sysadmin and sent him the following screenshot (attached to the task). A few hours later, all the money is gone from the card, and the sysadmin suddenly quit and is posting storis from the Maldives. You need to deal with this

forensic.name: Earth Rumble 2
forensic.desc: Perhaps this radio signal was received from space. Or was it?

forensic.name: Matryoshka doll
forensic.desc: Life is a matryoshka doll: you expect the new, but you get the old

misc.name: Strange code
misc.desc: У меня что-то со зрением или это новый язык программирования?

osint.name: High profile crime
osint.desc: In 1983, a terrible incident took place in a country. It is said that a famous actor was involved in this incident, but the exact date of his birth is what we are to find out.

osint.name: Shall we dive into history
osint.desc: In front of you is a character who has acquired the status of a legend, exalted in literature and cinema. Your task is to find the origin of this image and reveal the mystery of the personality behind this great character. Having solved this mystery you will be able to find a video of the whole history of the character, and the flag will be the name of the channel “YouTube”, which published the video (as a clue to the name of the channel we can say that this word is used differently in youth slang)

pwn.name: Buy an elephant
pwn.desc: Everybody says, “I want a flag,” but you buy an elephant.

pwn.name: Entry is not for everyone
pwn.desc: Buddy, can you pass my new defense system? 😎

rev.name: A strangers memory
rev.desc: A stranger's memory, like honey, always "tastes" better.

rev.name: VMM
rev.desc: I bought this virtual machine from someone I know.... Will you be able to get a flag now? :)

rev.name: Warm up
rev.desc: You have to stretch before you fight!

steg.name: Letter to Santa Claus
steg.desc: Do you believe in Santa Claus?

steg.name: Neural network
steg.desc: I asked the artificial intelligence for some information about text steganography, but it gave me a shuffle...What's the meaning of this?

steg.name: Skeleton
steg.desc: The clock is the skeleton of time, by which we can study the anatomy of space

steg.name: The attentive reader
steg.desc: Can you see what others can't see?
